name: One Man against The Machines
description:
Due to unknown reasons, a bunch of robots made for war have gone rogue in the facility they were being kept in. You, the human protagonist, have been sent in to take care of those robot bastards. It's time to kick robot ass and chew bubble gum in this challenging arcade shooter where you will try to survive for as long as possible while killing hordes of robots. Keep in mind this game is still in development. There are still things I plan to add such as better graphics, more enemies, weapons upgrades, boss fights and more!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AfkproO
